Name: Mummiform shabti for Tay
Description: Mummiform shabti made of fired pottery and then painted. The arms are crossed straight over the chest. The shabti is holding two small carved hoes. The tripartite wig reaches the chest. The legs are missing below the knees.The text is carved in lines on the front; a shorter version in distinctly wider lines with larger cursive hieroglyphs has been painted on.
